atk-s0402a52:2_1: Dutiyassa paṭhame sukhapaṭikkhepena dukkhā paṭipajjitabbato paṭipadā etissāti dukkhāpaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a52:2_2: Asīghappavattitāya garubhāvena dandhā abhiññā etissāti dandhābhiññā.
atk-s0402a52:4_5: Paññindriyanti hi ettha vipassanāpaññāva paññindriyanti adhippetaṁ.
atk-s0402a52:5_1: idha bhikkhu pubbe akatābhiniveso pubbabhāge rūpapariggahe kilamati,
atk-s0402a52:5_6: Evaṁ pañcasu ṭhānesu kilamanto vipassanaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a52:5_15: gotrabhuñāṇeti imesu navasu vipassanāñāṇesupi kilamitvāva lokuttaramaggaṁ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0402a52:5_16: Tassa so lokuttaramaggo evaṁ dukkhena garubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado dandhābhiñño nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a52:5_17: Yo pana pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamanto aparabhāge navasu vipassanāñāṇesu akilamitvāva maggaṁ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0402a52:5_18: tassa so maggo evaṁ dukkhena agarubhāvena sacchikatattā dukkhapaṭipado khippābhiñño nāma jāto.
atk-s0402a52:6_1: ekassa hi purisassa cattāro goṇā palāyitvā aṭaviṁ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0402a52:6_2: So sakaṇṭake sagahane vane te pariyesanto gahanamaggeneva kicchena kasirena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāneyeva nilīne goṇepi kicchena kasirena addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_3: Eko kicchena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhite khippameva addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_4: Aparo abbhokāsamaggena sukhena gantvā gahanaṭṭhāne nilīne kicchena kasirena addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_5: Aparo abbhokāsamaggeneva sukhena gantvā abbhokāse ṭhiteyeva khippaṁ addasa.
atk-s0402a52:6_6: Tattha cattāro goṇā viya cattāro ariyamaggā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0402a52:6_8: gahanamaggena kicchena kasirena gamanaṁ viya pubbabhāge pañcasu ñāṇesu kilamato dukkhāpaṭipadā.
atk-s0402a52:6_9: Gahanaṭṭhāne nilīnānaṁ kiccheneva dassanaṁ viya aparabhāge navasu ñāṇesu kilamantassa ariyamaggānaṁ dassanaṁ.
atk-s0402a52:8_1: Tatiye asubhānupassī kāye viharatīti attano karajakāye “yathā etaṁ,
atk-s0402a52:8_2: tathā ida”nti iminā nayena bahiddhā diṭṭhānaṁ dasannaṁ asubhānaṁ upasaṁharaṇavasena asubhānupassī viharati,
atk-s0402a52:8_3: attano kāyaṁ asubhato paṭikūlato ñāṇena passatīti attho.
atk-s0402a52:8_4: Āhāre paṭikūlasaññīti navannaṁ pāṭikulyānaṁ vasena kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭikūlasaññī.
atk-s0402a52:8_5: Sabbaloke anabhiratisaññīti sabbasmimpi tedhātuke lokasannivāse anabhiratāya ukkaṇṭhitasaññāya samannāgato.
atk-s0402a52:8_6: Sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccānupassīti sabbepi tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccato anupassanto.
atk-s0402a52:8_8: Ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hotīti niyakajjhatte suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā hoti.
atk-s0402a52:8_15: tesu pana pakatiyāva sampiyāyamānaṁ cittaṁ allīyati.
atk-s0402a52:8_16: Tasmā tāni bhāvento dukkhapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a52:8_18: tasmā tāni paṭipanno sukhapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a52:9_1: saṅgāmāvacarapuriso hi phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ katvā pañcāvudhāni sannayhitvā saṅgāmaṁ pavisati,
atk-s0402a52:9_2: so antarā vissamitukāmo phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ pavisitvā vissamati ceva pānabhojanādīni ca paṭisevati.
atk-s0402a52:9_3: Tato puna saṅgāmaṁ pavisitvā kammaṁ karoti.
atk-s0402a52:9_9: vissamitukāmassa phalakakoṭṭhakaṁ pavisitvā vissamanapānabhojanāni paṭisevanakālo viya vipassanāya kammaṁ
atk-s0402a52:9_10: karontassa cittuppādassa nirassādakkhaṇe pañca balāni nissāya cittaṁ sampahaṁsanakālo,
atk-s0402a52:9_11: vissamitvā khāditvā pivitvā ca puna saṅgāmassa pavisanakālo viya pañcahi balehi cittaṁ sampahaṁsetvā
atk-s0402a52:9_12: puna vipassanāya kammaṁ karontassa vivaṭṭetvā arahattaggahaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a52:9_13: Imasmiṁ pana sutte balāni ceva indriyāni ca missakāneva kathitānīti.
atk-s0402a52:13_1: Sattame mahāmoggallānattherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā ahesuṁ,
atk-s0402a52:13_5: imaṁ me paṭipadaṁ āgamma anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimutta”nti.
atk-s0402a52:15_1: Aṭṭhame dhammasenāpatittherassa heṭṭhimā tayo maggā sukhapaṭipadā dandhābhiññā,
atk-s0402a52:15_4: Imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu missikāva paṭipadā kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a52:17_1: Navame paṭhamadutiyapuggalā sukkhavipassakā sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saṅkhāranimittaṁ upaṭṭhapenti.
atk-s0402a52:17_2: Tesu eko vipassanindriyānaṁ balavattā idheva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyati,
atk-s0402a52:17_3: eko indriyānaṁ dubbalatāya idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ paṭilabhitvā sasaṅkhārena
atk-s0402a52:17_6: Tesaṁ eko asaṅkhārena appayogena indriyānaṁ balavattā idheva kilese khepeti,
atk-s0402a52:17_7: eko indriyānaṁ dubbalattā idha asakkonto anantare attabhāve tadeva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṁ paṭilabhitvā asaṅkhārena appayogena kilese khepetīti veditabbo.
atk-s0402a52:19_1: Dasame samathapubbaṅgamanti samathaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ purecārikaṁ katvā.
atk-s0402a52:19_3: Sotaṁ magganti ekacittakkhaṇikamaggassa āsevanādīni nāma natthi,
atk-s0402a52:19_4: dutiyamaggādayo pana uppādento tameva āsevati bhāveti bahulīkarotīti vuccati.
atk-s0402a52:19_5: Vipassanāpubbaṅgamanti vipassanaṁ pubbaṅgamaṁ purecārikaṁ katvā samathaṁ bhāveti,
atk-s0402a52:19_6: pakatiyā vipassanālābhī vipassanāya ṭhatvā samādhiṁ uppādetīti attho.
atk-s0402a52:20_1: Tattha teneva cittena samāpattiṁ samāpajjitvā teneva saṅkhāre sammasituṁ na sakkā.
atk-s0402a52:21_2: samayoti iminā sattannaṁ sappāyānaṁ paṭilābhakālo kathito.
atk-s0402a52:21_3: Yaṁ taṁ cittanti yasmiṁ samaye taṁ vipassanāvīthiṁ okkamitvā pavattaṁ cittaṁ.
atk-s0402a52:21_4: Ajjhattamevasantiṭṭhatīti vipassanāvīthiṁ paccottharitvā tasmiṁyeva gocarajjhattasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe santiṭṭhati.
